text: <@UCC8LGD43> when you do mockups, how do you share with your clients? Do you share the XD link? I found that part to be the hardest. We usually do our mockups in something and then put on invision board so we can record notes (and the client can as well)
<@U7SL518D6> I build out assets in photoshop and illustrator, then just use XD for prototyping.
Yea we’re kinda trying to figure out what workflow makes sense for us. The designers want to design primarily in XD I think, using Illustrator and Photoshop for more complex assets

So we usually first pull it up on a call with them and use the XD presenter mode (which I’m not a huge fan of.. but I think they may be working on improvements?). Then afterwards we email a PDF of the file to them to further review.
ah ok wasnt sure if there was another method that maybe i didnt see
Nothing that we’ve found. But always looking for better ways to present so let me know if you come across something!
Does anyone have a good tool for doing research on Social handles for companies? Like being able to enter a name and get back follower counts and some basic stats on their social profiles
lol guess I’m out of the loop klout was killed.
lol yea but something like that
thanks man, couldnt find anything initially
